Malden.Baker Congregational Church:
The Baker Congregational Church is a historic Congregational church at 760 Saratoga Street in East Boston, Massachusetts.


== History ==
With the growth of East Boston as a settlement in 1834, a need was seen for a church and meetinghouse for the inhabitants. The church was founded under the name First Congregational Church in East Boston, which on July 7, 1837, was changed to Maverick Congregational Church by the Society's majority shareholders.
